title: Include Gambling in $300m GameFi incentives
body:
Broaden the scope of Foundation's incentive program to include Casino Dapps that work directly on-chain, such as https://ftm.guru/casino, that add to Opera network's utilizaion.


References:
1. Official Fantom Foundation Announcement
https://fantom.foundation/blog/fantom-gamefi-incentives-how-to-apply/
author: 0xCF04f9e6fc622447c25EF04Bb63b5310C9723F83
